1378280.name: Stream Dogfighter
1378280.description:
Stream Dogfighter is a space ship dog-fighting game for Twitch.tv streamers.
Streamers can enjoy hosting their own space battles with your viewers joining in.

Is your stream geared towards space or scifi genre?
Now engage more with your viewers by giving them a space battle on your stream.

NB:

viewers interact with their ships via twitch chat or via our webpage !


“We want to get Stream Dogfighter in your hands as soon as possible and with your feedback we will do our best to make an enjoyable game for you
weather you choose to play solo or are hosting games on twitch for your viewers”

Want your favorite game mode added ?

Then join our Discord => See Steam Links

Watch out!

Stream Dogfighter is not finished! It is in active development: Full of bugs, missing features, and performance issues.
If you would like to play Stream Dogfighter when it is finished, follow our development progress.
We'll keep you informed as updates improve the game.

Completed Modes

Chat vs Chat

Team Mode (Red Vs Blue)
Simulation Mode

Partially Implemented Features / Under Development

Player vs Chat Mode (Let the Streamer/Player take control of his ship)

Solo Mode (Pilot your ship vs Ai) from 1v1 to 1v50

Planned Features That will be developed During Early Access


Leaderboards
Race Mode
